permissions: Admin users can create exports. Non-admin users must be permitted to create each related material transaction; the policy delegates create authorization to MaterialTransactionPolicy for every selected material transaction.
side_effects: Creates a material transaction export and its material_transaction_exports join records. After commit, an async formatter job runs and updates status, body, file_name, mime_type, and formatter_errors_details.
validation_notes: organization-formatter and material-transaction-ids are required. organization-formatter must be active and must be a MaterialTransactionsExportFormatter type. The export organization and organization-formatter must belong to the same organization. material-transactions must be present, integration-sourced, in scope with the exporting organization, and exportable (not voided).

flags.name: material-transaction-ids
flags.validation: Required; accepts comma-separated or repeated values
